row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Docker Base Url" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_BASE_URL#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certification Path" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_CERTI_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Container Id" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_CONTAINER_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Folder to export" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_FOLDER_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.HTTP_TIMEOUT_PARAMETERS
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Building output file path ! Checking if Folder path is empty ,if yes then create the resultant export file at default location otherwise ! create the file at the location given by the user :SET &UC4RB_DKR_FILENAME# = "exportcontainer-&$RUNID#.tar"
!Check if folder to export is empty then set folder to export path as agent working directory path :IF &UC4RB_DKR_FOLDER_PATH# = "" :SET &UC4RB_DKR_FOLDER_PATH# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_DKR_ACTION_NAME# = "EXPORT_CONTAINER"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#, string, 8
: SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "&UC4RB_DKR_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_DKR_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "&UC4RB_DKR_READ_TIMEOUT#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_DKR_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "&UC4RB_DKR_CERTI_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_DKR_CONTAINER_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[7] = "&UC4RB_DKR_FOLDER_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[8] = "&UC4RB_DKR_FILENAME#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_DKR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** EXPORT CONTAINER ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** EXPORT CONTAINER ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: ! Publishing output file path in case of success :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# = 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_DKR_EXPORT_FILE" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_EXPORT_FILE# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_EXPORT_FILE#,,"TOP" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_DKR_EXPORT_FILE# = "" :ENDIF
